html:
2026-0015
2026-01-14FINFinancial Administration ActOrder directing the Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation, the Canada Development Investment Corporation and the Royal Canadian Mint to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework Order directing the Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation, the Canada Development Investment Corporation, the Royal Canadian Mint, the Canada Growth Fund, the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, the Canada Indigenous Loan Guarantee Corporation and 16342451 Canada Inc. (the Crown corporations) to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.N/A
subject: Order directing the Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation, the Canada Development Investment Corporation and the Royal Canadian Mint to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework
precis: Order directing the Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation, the Canada Development Investment Corporation, the Royal Canadian Mint, the Canada Growth Fund, the Canada Enterprise Emergency Funding Corporation, the Canada Indigenous Loan Guarantee Corporation and 16342451 Canada Inc. (the Crown corporations) to comply the “Buy Canadian” Procurement Policy Framework in order to (1) align their policies, guidelines, and practices with the “Buy Canadian Procurement Policy Framework” and the policy instruments issued under section 6 of that framework, as amended from time to time, in a manner consistent with their respective mandate; and (2) report on the implementation of this directive in their next corporate plan.
